Name: Alice From Dallas
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring ingredients in the order listed.
Review: Coffee and orange spiked with tequila. The trio layer well and combine to make a tasty shot (perhaps stir together and sip to savour the experience rather than downing in one).
Nutrition: One serving of Alice From Dallas contains 114 calories
